channel.title: Please help me
channel.description:
Hello i realy need help to figure out that it is possible to make a npc? like lets say... is it possible to make a man npc with skillcape ect? please help me...
-Meele

item.title: Please help me
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Add the model for the NPC. Models section of these forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

de dust89:

I’m pretty sure it is possible…but it would be like making a custom item, instead an npc… this would be rather difficult aswell, but if someone knew how to like pnpc, and put on a skillcape then copy themselves to a file? that would be pretty awsome…im sure its possible, just complicated.

it has been cool

but i saw one topic for many days ago that one player was making “NPC of the month”…
he was making own npc’s… (or edited they)

-Meele

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

Goto Autospawn.cfg And under last one add spawn = Npcid xxxx yyyy 0 0 0 0 0 1 [name]

Read full topic
